attributes.action: Her Majesty’s Government must BAN Fluoride in drinking water, food processing water and water used agriculture and dairy farming.
attributes.additional_details:
Fluoride lowers consciousness and causes tooth staining. It is a cumulative poison that, irrespective of a low daily dose, will - over time, calcify the pineal gland (responsible for essential sleep & well-being hormones as well as states of consciousness) and cause Dental Fluorosis especially among Black people.

Fluoride is added to hundreds of retail dental products and is no longer necessary in drinking water.
